amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike language that sets up a new procedural criteria for an FMCSA study on minimum trucking insurance that is already underway.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 22 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to strike language that sets up a new procedural criteria for an FMCSA study on minimum trucking insurance that is already underway.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A063) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A063) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
